name: Dogs Peeing Everywhere!
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 31 - the theme is 'Entire Game on One Screen'.

You are a neighborhood dog and your mission is simple: pee on everything!

Run around with the arrow keys and pee on houses with the spacebar.

Peeing on houses marks them as your territory.

The dog with the most houses under it's control at the end of the round wins.

Made By: Matt Kelly

Music: Kevin MacLeod
